title: Gentoku
text: was a <a href="Japanese%20era%20name">Japanese era name</a> after "<a href="Karyaku">Karyaku</a>" and before "<a href="Genk%C5%8D%20%28second%29">Genkō</a>." This period spanned the years from August 1329 through April 1331 in the Southern Court, but continued to be used in the Northern Court until 1332. The reigning Emperor was .
